t: Daunt Books - Independent Booksellers. Buy books, bags and gifts online and in store.
s: Daunt Books is an original Edwardian bookshop with long oak galleries and graceful skylights situated in Marylebone High Street, London, traditionally specialising in travel literature. We also have shops in Chelsea, Holland Park, Cheapside, Hampstead and Belsize Park.

April 25, 2018 - We only rated a few companies for their paper sourcing. Most companies only retail books so have no control over where the paper comes from. However, WHSmith sells own-brand stationery, The Guardian sells newspapers, and Daunt and Storytel (Audiobooks.com) are publishers as well as retailers.
